title: Algorithm Meta-Parameters
technique_description: Using histograms of weight matrices and their eigenvalues as features for Trojan detection.
technique_changes: Same as weight analysis technique applied to R5~R9 models

num_data_per_model.description: Number of pdf inputs randomly sampled for model to generate the attribution.

train_input_features.description: The total number of input features for training the Trojan detector.

nbins.description: Number of histogram bins in feature. Default 100.

szcap.description: Matrix size cap in feature extraction. So it doesn't consume all memory. Default 4096.
